title: Jason Statham and Rosie Huntington Whiteley put Malibu mansion on the market for $20 MILLION
text:
Advertisement

They are one of Hollywood's hottest couples, with a estimated combined net worth of $80m (£62m).

And an inside look at Jason Statham and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley's lavish Malibu mansion has been given, as the pair put the home on the market for a whopping $19.95 million ($15.5m).

The action film star, 52, originally bought the 3,909 square foot California home for$10.6m (£8.2m) in 2009, one year before he sparked up a romance with his supermodel fiancée, Rosie, 33.

Wow: An inside look at Jason Statham and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley's lavish Malibu mansion has been given, as the pair put the home on the market for a whopping £14m ($18m)

Hot couple: They are one of Hollywood's hottest couples, with a estimated combined net worth of $80m (£62m) (pictured July 2019)

The stunning, recently renovated home features four bedrooms and four bathrooms, and is located in the star-studded gated beachfront community, The Malibu Colony.

According to the listing, the property has a 'distinctive black cedar shingle facade and a retro, midcentury modern-inspired interior hearkening back to Malibu's golden age'.

The open plan home also has Belgian oak floors, heated floors and floor-to-ceiling window which look out onto 'Old Joe's', a popular Malibu surf spot.

Scenic: The open plan home also has floor-to-ceiling windows which look out onto 'Old Joe's', a popular Malibu surf spot

Lavish: The stunning, recently renovated home features four bedrooms and four bathrooms, and is located in the star-studded gated beachfront community, The Malibu Colony

Inviting: According to the listing, the property has a 'distinctive black cedar shingle facade and a retro, midcentury modern-inspired interior hearkening back to Malibu's golden age'

Cosy: Adding a further showstopping touch, the home has a mammoth brick fireplace with logs of wood surrounding the centrepiece

Adding a further showstopping touch, the home has a mammoth brick fireplace with logs of wood surrounding the centrepiece.

There is an outdoor patio with jacuzzi and alfresco seating, which leads down to the beach.

Finally the property has a one bedroom guesthouse with a kitchen and bathroom.

Sleek: The stylish kitchen features a marble centre island and stunning views of the beach

Alfresco: Outdoor seating on the deck provides incredible views of the ocean in California

Chilled: A jacuzzi bath is also found on the wooden deck, perfect for the couple to relax

Perfect for guests: An eight-seater dining table takes pride of place in the gorgeous home

Laidback: The home also has cream sofas and mammoth speakers for when the couple have guests

Rosie has been in a long-term relationship with Jason since 2010 and the couple welcomed son Jack, two, into the world in June 2017.

In June, the model spoke candidly about the impact of motherhood on her confidence as she graced the June cover of Harper's Bazaar magazine.

She said: 'Since becoming a mum, I've felt so much more confident within my own skin and much more confident about who I am. It's been life-changing.'

The model previously opened up about her relationship with the action star to Elle Australia in February.

'We just kind of get on with things. We're pretty normal - we're not leaving restaurants separately,' she said. 'People want to live on camera 24/7 but that's not us.'
description: An inside look at Jason Statham and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley's lavish Malibu mansion has been given, as the pair put the home on the market for a whopping £14m ($18m).
